original_solution_mapping.L1: One student got 37 questions right because 40 - 3 = <<40-3=37>>37
original_solution_mapping.L2: This student's proportion right is .925 because 37 / 40 = <<37/40=.925>>.925
original_solution_mapping.L3: This student got a 92.5% because .925 x 100 = <<.925*100=92.5>>92.5
original_solution_mapping.L4: The student got got a 95% got 38 right because 40 x .95 = <<40*.95=38>>38
original_solution_mapping.L5: Hannah must beat the student who got a 38 because 38 > 37
original_solution_mapping.L6: Hannah needs to get 39 questions right because 38 + 1 = <<38+1=39>>39

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7193.
    Returns: the number of questions Hannah needs to get right.
    """
    # L1
    total_questions = 40 # 40
    wrong_questions = 3 # 3 wrong out of 40
    student1_right_questions = total_questions - wrong_questions

    # L2
    student1_proportion_right = student1_right_questions / total_questions

    # L3
    percent_multiplier = 100 # WK
    student1_percentage = student1_proportion_right * percent_multiplier

    # L4
    student2_percentage_value = 95 # 95% on the exam
    student2_percentage_decimal = 0.95 # 95% on the exam
    student2_right_questions = total_questions * student2_percentage_decimal

    # L6
    score_to_beat_plus_one = 1 # 38 + 1
    hannah_required_score = student2_right_questions + score_to_beat_plus_one

    # FA
    answer = hannah_required_score
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: One student got {student1_right_questions} questions right because {total_questions} - {wrong_questions} = <<{total_questions}-{wrong_questions}={student1_right_questions}>>{student1_right_questions}

This student's proportion right is {student1_proportion_right} because {student1_right_questions} / {total_questions} = <<{student1_right_questions}/{total_questions}={student1_proportion_right}>>{student1_proportion_right}
This student got a {student1_percentage}% because {student1_proportion_right} x {percent_multiplier} = <<{student1_proportion_right}*{percent_multiplier}={student1_percentage}>>{student1_percentage}

The student got got a {student2_percentage_value}% got {student2_right_questions} right because {total_questions} x {student2_percentage_decimal} = <<{total_questions}*{student2_percentage_decimal}={student2_right_questions}>>{student2_right_questions}

Hannah needs to get {hannah_required_score} questions right because {student2_right_questions} + {score_to_beat_plus_one} = <<{student2_right_questions}+{score_to_beat_plus_one}={hannah_required_score}>>{hannah_required_score}
